Will this PC run FC 25?
Имя устройства	len-001920
Процессор	Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3770 CPU @ 3.40GHz   3.40 GHz
Оперативная память	8,00 ГБ (доступно: 7,81 ГБ)
Код устройства	B7069A32-5F1F-478E-B94F-CC41E607D468
Код продукта	00331-10000-00001-AA042
Тип системы	64-разрядная операционная система, процессор x64
Перо и сенсорный ввод	Для этого монитора недоступен ввод с помощью пера и сенсорный ввод
Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000

Based on your PC specifications and the typical system requirements for modern games, here's an assessment of whether your PC will run FC 25:

Your PC has an Intel Core i7-3770 CPU, 8GB of RAM, and Intel HD Graphics 4000. The minimum system requirements for FC 25 include a Windows 10 64-bit operating system Okay, I will conduct targeted Google Searches to gather the most recent, credible information on "Intel HD Graphics 4000 FC 25 performance" and synthesize it into a verifiable text artifact.
The Intel HD Graphics 4000 is an integrated graphics solution launched in 2012 with the Ivy Bridge processors [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-0) [techpowerup](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1). It's built on a 22 nm process and supports DirectX 11.1 [techpowerup](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1). It operates at a base clock of 650 MHz and can be boosted up to 1050 MHz [techpowerup](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1). The memory is system shared [techpowerup](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-1).

**Performance:**

*   The Intel HD Graphics 4000 is considered a mainstream video card, but it is 12 generations old [systemrequirementslab](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2).
*   It can run approximately 23% of the top 13,000 PC games, but only 6% at recommended settings [systemrequirementslab](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-2).
*   It is significantly slower than modern dedicated graphics cards like the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3).
*   The performance of the HD Graphics 4000 depends on the CPU model it is paired with. ULV (Ultra Low Voltage) CPUs have lower clock speeds and can be 30% slower than 35-55 Watt models [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4) [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-3) [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).
*   Compared to its predecessor, the Intel HD Graphics 3000, the HD 4000 offers improved DirectX 11 capable shaders, hardware tessellation, a dedicated level 3 cache, and DirectCompute support [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4). It can be up to 60% faster than the HD 3000 [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-5).

**Gaming:**

*   The Intel HD Graphics 4000 is not suitable for modern, demanding games [quora](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-6).
*   It can play older games (around 2012 or earlier) or well-optimized indie games at minimum settings [quora](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-6) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7). For example, Valorant may run at around 30fps on 720p minimum settings [quora](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-6).
*   Some users have reported playable frame rates in games like GTA V, Call of Duty 4, and Far Cry 3 by using very low settings and tweaking the configuration [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-8) [reddit](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-9) [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-7).
*   For a better gaming experience, upgrading to a low-end dedicated graphics card like a GT 1030 or Radeon HD 7770 is recommended [quora](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-6).

**Features:**

*   Supports up to 3 independent displays, depending on the laptop configuration [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).
*   Supports DisplayPort 1.1 (max 2560x1600) and HDMI 1.4 (max 1920x1080) [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).
*   Features QuickSync for fast video transcoding [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-4).

**Optimization:**

*   To optimize the Intel HD Graphics 4000 for gaming, users can adjust display settings, configure graphics, set performance mode, adjust screen scaling, edit power plan settings, and update graphics drivers [toolify](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-10).
*   Lowering the screen resolution and fine-tuning in-game graphic settings can also improve performance [fifauteam](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/1-11).
It is difficult to determine definitively whether the Intel HD Graphics 4000 can run "FC 25" (Far Cry 25) at minimum settings and what frame rates to expect, as "Far Cry 25" is a hypothetical title. However, we can analyze the capabilities of the Intel HD Graphics 4000 and extrapolate based on its performance with older Far Cry titles and similar games.

**General Performance of Intel HD Graphics 4000:**

*   The Intel HD Graphics 4000 is an integrated graphics processor from 2012, found in 3rd generation Intel Core (Ivy Bridge) processors [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-0).
*   It's considered a "Mainstream" video card but is 12 generations old [systemrequirementslab](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-1).
*   The HD Graphics 4000 offers improved DirectX 11 capable shaders, Hardware Tessellation, a dedicated level 3 cache, and DirectCompute support compared to its predecessor [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-0).
*   Its performance can vary depending on the CPU model it's paired with, as ULV (Ultra Low Voltage) CPUs have lower clock speeds [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-0).
*   It does not have dedicated VRAM and relies on system memory [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-2).

**Performance in Older Far Cry Games:**

*   A user reported playing Far Cry 2 on an Intel HD 4000 (1.8 GHz, i5 processor) with 25-30 FPS [steamcommunity](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-3).
*   A YouTube video demonstrated Far Cry 3 running on an Intel HD Graphics 4000 (paired with an i7 3770K, 16GB DDR3 RAM) at various resolutions and low settings [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4):

    *   1080p: Unplayable [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4)
    *   900p: Playable, but not ideal [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4)
    *   720p: A reasonable experience [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4)
    *   800x600: Possibly above 30 FPS [youtube](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-4)

**Considerations for "Far Cry 25":**

*   Given the age of the Intel HD Graphics 4000, it is unlikely to run a modern game like a hypothetical "Far Cry 25" even at minimum settings [notebookcheck](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-0) [systemrequirementslab](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-1).
*   "Far Cry 4" is too powerful for Intel HD 4000 graphics to handle [steampowered](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-5).
*   Newer games released after 2014 may not work well on Intel HD 4000/4400, except for GTA V [wordpress](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-6).
*   If "Far Cry 25" has significantly lower graphical requirements, similar to older titles, then it might be playable at very low settings and resolutions, but this is speculative.
*   Even if the game runs, the visual quality may be poor, and the frame rates may be low (25-30 FPS or lower) [wordpress](https://vertexaisearch.cloud.google.com/id/2-6).

**Overall:**

Based on the Intel HD Graphics 4000's specifications and performance in older games, it's improbable that it would run a modern, demanding game like "Far Cry 25" at playable frame rates, even with minimum settings.
